name: @aprestmo/norway-geodata
description: Administrative geographic data for Norway including municipalities, counties, and postal codes.

scripts.test: npm run build && node -e "console.log('Running TypeScript validation...'); require('./dist/index.js'); console.log('✅ All exports working correctly!');"
scripts.validate: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); ['./data/kommuner-2025.json', './data/fylker-2025.json'].forEach(f => JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(f, 'utf8'))); console.log('✅ JSON files valid');"
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run validate && npm run build && npm test

author: Andreas Prestmo
